channel.title: Old School Spawn?
channel.description:
Honestly, there are no more old school spawn servers. All of the spawn servers are 2009+. I'm looking for a 2007-2008 spawn, basic 317 gameframe. Does anyone know of any because I've looked around for the past hour and I've found none.
And I'm talking about a server to play, not a source and client.
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: Old School Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We have a server advertisement page for a reason.

I wouldn’t say this in itself was an advertisement, but it still isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Old School Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:10, topic:437652”]I understand the rules I broke them enough, but there is a difference from someone spamming people inboxes with unwelcome links, then someone asking for a server.

Also if people don’t send links and just names its a different story.[/quote]

Rule 10: [b]We never advertise via the PM system[/b] whether the site is approved or not. If your site is approved than you must advertise through appropriate means.

nevar bic boi.

And I see sending a name and sending a link both as advertising.

Read full topic

item.title: Old School Spawn?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:8, topic:437652”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=540354.msg3957173#msg3957173 date=1332879382]

You’re not suppose to request things, But since this is more or less a question you should have posted this in the “General questions” section

No requests and no advertising.

There was absolutely no advertising, nor request in my topic. Read before you write, and it was moved to the appropriate section in general questions.

You’re asking people to link you to a server. Aka: Requesting an advertisement.
[/quote]They can pm him the link, which is indeed allowed.[/quote]

read teh rulez kracky.

Rule 10: We never advertise via the PM system whether the site is approved or not. If your site is approved than you must advertise through appropriate means.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html
